_header: Presence of you it causeth my comfort
_description: ‘I am yowr owen’, by Charles d’Orléans — three 7-line stanzas (ababbcc) and 4-line Envoy (aabb)

BLHar682.First Lines:
PResence of yow hit causith my comfortAnd so my payne when sight of
                    yow y mysse…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…I am your owen and wol ben evyrOwt secund choys or on vnto
                    me levir
